Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_count

The function AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_count sets the number of times for a 3D sample to loop.

void AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_count(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  U32 loops
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to set the loop count on.
loops
is the number of times the sound is to loop (use zero to loop forever).

Discussion

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_loop_count, AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_block
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, U32, void
